{
    "common": {
        "acctName": "{{acctName}}",
        "source": "RESTAPI",
        "clientVersion": "Valtix-2022"
    },
    "ucRequest": {
        "name": "fqdn-profile",
        "description": "",
        "fqdnFilterProfile": {
            "profileProperties": {
                "fqdnFilterList": [
                    {
                        "priority": 1,
                        "fqdnList": [
                            "public.ecr.aws",
                            "ocsp.verisign.com",
                            "ocsp.sca2a.amazontrust.com",
                            "prod.telemetry.tableausoftware.com",
                            "dci.sophosupd.com",
                            "ocsp.sca4a.amazontrust.com",
                            "ocsp.rootg2.amazontrust.com",
                            "www.public-trust.com",
                            "pypi.python.org",
                            "security.ubuntu.com",
                            "download.opensuse.org",
                            ".*.windowsupdate.com",
                            ".*.delivery.mp.microsoft.com",
                            "emdl.ws.microsoft.com",
                            "adl.windows.com",
                            "files.pythonhosted.org",
                            ".*.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov",
                            "ocsp.sca1a.amazontrust.com",
                            "s.ss2.us",
                            "neowms.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov",
                            "mirror.centos.org",
                            "neo.gsfc.nasa.gov",
                            ".*.centrify.com",
                            "ocsp.entrust.net",
                            "crl.rootca1.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.sca3a.amazontrust.com",
                            "crl.sca1b.amazontrust.com",
                            ".*windowsupdate.com",
                            ".*windowsupdate.microsoft.com",
                            "yum.datadoghq.com",
                            "pypi.org",
                            "ocsp.digicert.com",
                            "privacy-policy.truste.com",
                            "ocsp.sca3a.amazontrust.com",
                            "ocsp.sca0a.amazontrust.com",
                            "ocsp.sca1b.amazontrust.com",
                            "ocsp.rootca1.amazontrust.com",
                            "crl.rootg2.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.sca2a.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.sca4a.amazontrust.com",
                            "download.fedoraproject.org",
                            "crt.sca1a.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.rootca1.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.sca0a.amazontrust.com",
                            "crt.sca1b.amazontrust.com",
                            ".*update.microsoft.com",
                            ".*.gsfc.nasa.gov",
                            "go.microsoft.com",
                            "awsartifact.labsteradata.net",
                            "launchpad.net",
                            "ocsp.godaddy.com",
                            "keyserver.ubuntu.com",
                            ".*.archive.ubuntu.com",
                            ".*amazonaws.com"
                        ],
                        "categories": [
                        ],
                        "policy": {
                            "policy": "ALLOW_LOG",
                            "name": "Allow Log"
                        },
                        "decryptException": false
                    }
                ],
                "defaultFQDNFilter": {
                    "fqdn": ".*",
                    "policy": {
                        "name": "Deny No log",
                        "policy": "DENY_NOLOG"
                    },
                    "decryptException": false
                },
                "defaultUncategorizedFQDNFilter": {
                    "categories": [
                        {
                            "vendor": "BRIGHTCLOUD",
                            "categoryID": "0"
                        }
                    ],
                    "policy": {
                        "name": "Deny log",
                        "policy": "DENY"
                    },
                    "decryptException": false
                },
                "noFqdnDeny": false
            }
        }
    }
}
